archimate:Device.name: Employee Smart Locker (ESL)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Secure storage and charging of mobile devices, uniforms, personal items, or hospital-issued equipment by staff.
Specifications:
• Form Factor: o Modular units with 20 individual lockers per module • Device Charging Support: o Each locker includes USB-A, USB-C, or AC outlet for device charging • Construction: o Steel body with antimicrobial powder coating • Monitoring & Logs: o cloud-based or LAN access logs, door status, and alert notifications • Display Interface: o Touchscreen control panel at central unit (for management and access configuration) • Power Supply: o 220–240V AC input • Security Features: o Tamper detection, forced-entry alarm, remote lock/unlock capability • Ventilation: o Passive air vents or silent fan-based cooling for heat dissipation • Network: o Ethernet and Wi-Fi for remote access logs and central management
